sourcesContent:
import styled from "styled-components" const livro = [ { "id": "1", "titulo": "Drácula", "autor": "Bram Stoker", "editora": "Martin Claret", "preco":"32,00", "imagem": "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/8103mYz1aTS._SL1500_.jpg" }, { "id": "2", "titulo": "Carmilla", "autor": "Joseph Sheridan Le Fanu", "editora": "Editora Wish", "preco":"55,00", "imagem": "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/91lCo0lhKuL._SY342_.jpg" }, { "id": "3", "titulo": "Carmilla: A vampira de Karnstein", "autor": "Joseph Sheridan Le Fanu", "editora": "Novo Século", "preco":"42,50", "imagem": "https://www.gruponovoseculo.com.br/image/cache/catalog/products/Carmilla-350x440.png" }, { "id": "4", "titulo": "Saboroso Cadáver", "autor": "Agustina Bazterrica", "editora": "Darkside", "preco":"37,90", "imagem": "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/714Y-3rNGmL._SL1500_.jpg" }, { "id": "5", "titulo": "Memórias póstumas de Brás Cubas", "autor": "Machado de Assis", "editora": "Culturama", "preco":"29,99", "imagem": "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/61DH2cLaQwL._SL1000_.jpg" }, { "id": "6", "titulo": "Memórias póstumas de Brás Cubas", "autor": "Machado de Assis", "editora": "Moderna Literatura", "preco":"42,00", "imagem": "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/91NgBtVegoL._SL1500_.jpg" }, { "id": "7", "titulo": "Memórias póstumas de Brás Cubas", "autor": "Machado de Assis", "editora": "Penguin Books", "preco":"29,99", "imagem": "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/61-X+Q-DkQL._SL1500_.jpg" }, { "id": "8", "titulo": "O Alienista", "autor": "Machado de Assis", "editora": "Excelsior", "preco":"39,99", "imagem": "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/91EoMxFcfKL._SL1500_.jpg" }, { "id": "9", "titulo": "O Alienista", "autor": "Machado de Assis", "editora": "Panda Books", "preco":"19,99", "imagem": "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/81FxJtYdVML._SL1500_.jpg" }, { "id": "10", "titulo": "O médico e o monstro", "autor": "Robert Louis Stevenson", "editora": "Principis", "preco":"27,80", "imagem": "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/717l8ZCezhL._SL1360_.jpg" }, { "id": "11", "titulo": "Frankenstein", "autor": "Mary Shelley", "editora": "Editora Antofágica", "preco":"39,99", "imagem": "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/81-OgmOxScL._SL1500_.jpg" }, { "id": "12", "titulo": "Frankenstein: edição bolso", "autor": "Mary Shelley", "editora": "Clássicos Zahar", "preco":"21,00", "imagem": "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/91Kz+sC5X0L._SL1500_.jpg" } ] const Opcoes = styled.section` display: flex; ` const Card = styled.div` background-color: #ffffff; border-radius: 12px; text-align: center; ` const CapaLivro = styled.img` width: 150px; ` function CardLivros(){ return(
{livro.map((texto) =>(

{texto.titulo}

{texto.autor}

{texto.editora}

{texto.preco}

 ))}
) } export default CardLivros
